page.title: 14A DAY AT SCHOOL- Gina Davies
page.content:
At school I jotted things in my diary. In the assembly at 9:05 a story was read out by Mrs Poole our head teacher. After that we did some work for the next school we go to.I had to write a poem in my neatest writing and do some art and write a story.For my art I did a rabbit putting it's paws on a hedgehog's shoulder. At school my brother did some sewing and he finished his tortoise he was making so he brought it home.For homework he had Maths and Reading. My sister Natalie got to school at 8:45 and had reading for homework.
(When this was written,Gina was a top Junior,Christopher was a first-year Junior and Natalie was first-year Infants.)
